oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Union Street looking toward 5th Ave., Nashville, Tenn., between 1920 and 1929
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of Union Street looking toward Fifth Avenue in downtown Nashville, Tennessee. Businesses line both sides of the street. Identifiable signage includes the Linen Store, Economy Shoe Store and L.H. Brooks, a clothing company. Busy pedestrians walk the sidewalks, while cars drive in both directions on the road. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Linen Store (Nashville, Tenn.); Economy Shoe Store (Nashville, Tenn.); L.H. Brooks Company (Nashville, Tenn.)
